summary: Build a website for an audio business, expanded to include a product showcase with an Add to Cart feature for selling audio-related products.

existing_features.title: Create a responsive multi-section marketing website for an audio business with clear navigation and content sections for: Hero, Services, Portfolio/Work, About, and Contact.
Implement a Contact form that collects name, email, and message; validate inputs on the client; and submit inquiries to the backend for persistence.
Add a simple internal 'Inquiries' page/section in the frontend that fetches and displays submitted contact inquiries from the backend.

Include a Portfolio/Work section that can showcase at least 3 example projects, each with a title, short description, and optional embedded audio player (HTML5 audio) using sample audio files stored as static assets.

Define and apply a cohesive visual theme suitable for a premium audio business (colors, typography, spacing, and component styling) and enforce it consistently across all sections and pages. Avoid blue/purple as dominant brand colors.
Generate and include static image assets for the site (logo and hero background) and render them from frontend/public/assets/generated.
Update the product showcase/catalog to include the following products: cable marking stickers, XLR cables, and used musical instruments.
Ensure the existing Add to Cart flow works for the newly listed products, including handling missing product prices gracefully if prices are not configured.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a website for an audio business
Add product showcase and simple Add to Cart cart flow for selected products (cable marking stickers, XLR cables, used musical instruments).
